select p.provider, p.providerName, p.icon, a.id, a.userid, a.username, a.socialuserid, a.createdDate, a.updatedDate from jbx_socials_provider p left join jbx_socials_associate a
on a.provider = p.provider and a.book_id = p.book_id and a.book_id = #{bookId} and a.userid = #{id} where p.status =1 and p.deleted = 'n' order by p.sortindex
